text: Tony Dreyfus (born January 9, 1939 in Paris) was a member of the National Assembly of France from 1997 to 2012. He represented the city of Paris, and was a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paris Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Tony Dreyfus
